DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to illustrate surgeons' own perception of fatigue and the impact they felt it had on their performance. This was accomplished through a focus group study, where 13 surgeons participated.
DOC.brief_title: Perception of Fatigue Among Surgeons During Night Shifts
DOC.criteria: Doctors working at department of surgical gastrointerology, who gave informed consent Withdrawal of consent
